00018 BdkDalitzCfg::BdkDalitzCfg(const char *name, const char *title) :
00019   BdkDalitzBase(name,title,BdkDalitzBase::D0,BdkDalitzBase::PPP0)
00020 {
00021 
00022   _m23VetoMass = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName())+".m23VetoMass",
00023                                 TString(GetName())+" m23 mass veto window",0);
00024 
00025   // link our parameters to the pdf:
00026   RooListProxy * proxyList =  new RooListProxy(TString(GetName()) + ".proxyList",
00027                                                TString(GetTitle()) + " proxyList",
00028                                                this);
00029 
00030   proxyList->add(*_m23VetoMass);
00031 }

00046 void BdkDalitzCfg::setM23VetoMass(Double_t min, Double_t max)
